name: @bt-dsl/formatter
description: Prettier plugin for BT DSL using tree-sitter parser

scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p dist && cp ../tree-sitter-bt-dsl/tree-sitter-bt_dsl.wasm dist/ || (echo 'Error: WASM not found. Run: pnpm build:grammar' && exit 1)
scripts.test: node dist/test/test-format.js && node dist/test/test-standard-nodes.js && node dist/test/test-params.js && node dist/test/test-comment-preservation.js && node dist/test/test-extern-parens.js
